description.en:
Melissa, the prince’s fiancée, bravely endures difficult days after being openly deceived. Since her childhood, she has trained every day to become an illustrious queen, but perhaps this marriage is doomed to failure. That’s when the king’s "younger brother" appears, Ashley, who loves to tease her.

"Well, how about some time and freedom?"

Melissa’s love and life take an unexpected turn!
description.fr:
Melissa, fiancée du prince, endure courageusement des jours difficiles après avoir été ouvertement trompée. Depuis son enfance, elle s'est entraînée chaque jour pour devenir une illustre reine, mais peut-être que ce mariage est voué à l'échec. C'est alors qu'apparaît le " frère cadet" du roi, Ashley, qui adore la taquiner.

"Eh bien, que dirais-tu d'avoir un peu de temps et de liberté ?"

L'amour et la vie de Melissa prennent un tournant inattendu !

description.en:
Tsukina is summoned to another world and is told by a talking orb who introduces itself as a god that she is to be the savior of another world and that she is to balance it with her high magical power, whatever that means. Being already in her thirties, she refuses at first and tells the orb to leave it to those that are younger. Though there are already others that have been summoned to that world, it insists that she go, telling her that it'll grant her any wish in return. In response, she asks to have the strongest protection magic and requests for a function that allows her to summon any item as long as she googles for it. Thus begins her leisurely life in another world as she sets up a quiet and remote book café.

---
In this charming tale, a woman gets transported to a fantasy world and pursues her own quest: opening a book café!

Tsukina is a single, thirty-something office worker whose favorite thing is curling up with a good book. When a god tells her that she must go to another world to become its magical savior, Tsukina isn’t interested. She has zero desire to go on some grand hero’s journey. So when she arrives in this strange new land, she decides to use her magical powers to create a cozy little book café instead. Her first customer is a handsome soldier who loves reading almost as much as she does. But when a fellow “savior” starts causing trouble, Tsukina might have to play the hero after all!
description.it: Tsukina viene convocata in un altro mondo e le viene detto da una sfera parlante che si presenta come un dio che deve essere la salvatrice di un altro mondo e che deve bilanciarlo con il suo alto potere magico, qualunque cosa questo significhi. Essendo già trentenne, all'inizio rifiuta e dice alla sfera di lasciarla ai più giovani. Anche se ce ne sono già altri che sono stati convocati in quel mondo, insiste che lei se ne vada, dicendole che in cambio esaudirà ogni suo desiderio. In risposta, chiede di avere la magia di protezione più forte e chiede una funzione che le permetta di evocare qualsiasi oggetto, purché lo cerchi su Google. Inizia così la sua vita tranquilla in un altro mondo, mentre allestisce un tranquillo e remoto caffè del libro.
description.ja:
私に世界は救えません！！

アラサー女子のツキナは、「神」と自称する球体により、異世界へ喚ばれてしまった。「神」は何でも願いを叶える事と引き替えに、「救世主」として異世界に安定をもたらすよう言ってくるのだけど…。ハイスペックアラサー女子の異世界ラブライフ！
description.uk: "Я не можу врятувати світ!" 33-річна Цукіна була викликана в інший світ сферою котра називає себе "Богом".В обмін на виконання будь-якого бажання,Бог каже їй відправитися в інший світ як їхній "Рятівник".Однак...

title.en: Isekai Raku Raku Survival: Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival: Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island With Four Beautiful Girls

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. 

High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

With the way back to Earth blocked, thus began a dangerous life of survival on an uninhabited island in another world!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！ こうして地球への帰り道は閉ざされたまま、異世界の無人島で危険なサバイバル生活が始まった！！

---

description.en:
Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?  

---

altTitles.ja: スラムダンク
SLAM DUNK 新装再編版

description.en:
Winning isn't everything in the game of basketball, but who wants to come in second? It takes dedication and discipline to be the best, and the Shohoku High hoops team wants to be just that. They have one last year to make their captain's dream of reaching the finals come true–will they do it? Takehiko Inoue's legendary beloved basketball manga is finally here and the tale of a lifetime is in your hands.

Hanamichi Sakuragi's got no game with girls—none at all! It doesn't help that he's known for throwing down at a moment's notice and always coming out on top. A hopeless bruiser, he's been rejected by 50 girls in a row! All that changes when he meets the girl of his dreams, Haruko, and she's actually not afraid of him! When she introduces him to the game of basketball, his life is changed forever…

On the day of the Wizarding City Paz's destruction, Amina got stuck inside a lamp while trying to turn back time. And 300 years later, she was awakened by a military commander, Jakal.

“I do not have any wishes for you to grant.”
Well, I just want to hurry and grant a wish so I can go back, who the hell is this guy?
  
“Do you know who I am?”
“There is no one else in this world who knows you better than I do.”
“That’s not possible… I’ll disappear one of these days!”

Amina, who needs to go back into the lamp after granted the wishes suddenly meets Jakal who wants to give up his wishes to be with her. However, there are many dangers and threats that prevent him from doing so. Will Amina achieve her wish in the end?

---
Official Translations:
* [Simplified Chinese](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28238)
* [Traditional Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/aminafromlamp/list?title_no=2059)

description.pl:
Co możesz zrobić z trzema życzeniami?

Amina, jedna z ostatnich magików, utraciła wszystkich, których kochała podczas ataku na pałac. Próbując cofnąć się w czasie, aby ich ocalić, utknęła w lampie.

300 lat później pułkownik Jakal obudził ją.

Ma tylko trzy życzenia nim Amina wróci do lampy.

Czego sobie zażyczy?

メイデーア転生物語 この世界で一番悪い魔女

altTitles.ru: История реинкарнаций в Мейдере

altTitles.de: Wiedergeburt in Maydare: Die bösartigste Hexe der Welt

altTitles.fr: Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré
Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré: La pire sorcière en le monde

description.de: Einst rettete Makia, die Tochter einer berüchtigten Hexe, dem Sklavenjungen Thor das Leben. Gemeinsam wuchsen sie auf und erlernten magische Fähigkeiten. Doch dann reißt das Schicksal sie auseinander und Makia landet an einer Magierakademie, wo sie sich schwört, die beste Schülerin ihres Jahrgangs zu werden, um ihren alten Freund möglichst schnell wiederzufinden. Denn es gibt noch ein weiteres Geheimnis, das sie verbindet: Beide kamen ursprünglich aus einer anderen Welt nach Maydare! Dort war Makia eine gewöhnliche, japanische Oberschülerin, die gemeinsam mit zwei anderen Klassenkameraden umgebracht wurde. Wird es ihr gelingen, das Verbrechen aufzuklären und in der neuen Welt ihr Glück zu finden?
description.en:
Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School!  


---
description.fr: Makia est une noble dame issue d'une infâme sorcière. Thor, un garçon qui a été élevé avec elle et est venu d'un autre monde, est choisi pour être le chevalier du «sauveur». Les deux sont forcés de se séparer, et pour revoir Thor, Makia vise à être la meilleure élève de Magic School!
description.id: Makia adalah seorang gadis bangsawan yang merupakan keturunan dari seorang penyihir yang dikenal akan kejahatannya. Thor, seorang anak laki-laki yang dirawat bersama makia dan datang dari dunia lain, dipilih untuk menjadi seorang ksatria bagi sang "penyelamat". Keduanya terpaksa harus berpisah karena suatu alasan, dan ketika mereka berdua dipertemukan kembali, Makia bertekad untuk menjadi murid terbaik yang ada di sekolah sihir! ---
description.ru: Загадочный мир под названием «Мейдер». В нём существуют магия, рыцари, драконы и… ведьмы. Макия – юная волшебница из дворянской семьи, являющаяся потомком «Самой худшей ведьмы этого мира», и любительница провести вечерок-другой, изучая новые заклинания. Однажды она встречает необычного паренька, которому даёт имя Тор. Вместе они продолжают углубляться в исследование колдовства и довольно быстро находят общий язык. Это начало длинной истории о девочке, пытающейся понять себя и свои истинные чувства.
description.tr: Makia, kötü şöhretli bir cadının soyundan gelen asil bir hanımefendi. Başka bir dünyadan gelen ve Makia ile birlikte büyüyen Thor, "Kurtarıcı"nın şövalyesi olarak seçiliyor. İkisi de birbirlerinden ayrılmak zorunda kalıyorlar ve Makia, Thor'u bir kez daha görmek için Büyü Okulu'nun en iyi öğrencisi olmayı hedefliyor!

altTitles.ja: 蓮禄昕～宿命の華～

altTitles.es-la: La heroína oculta de su Majestad

description.en:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/his-majestys-secret-heroine/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/76054)
description.es-la: Yeon Lokheun es una niña que crece viviendo como un niño aprendiendo artes marciales y espirituales. Se dirige al palacio para limpiar el nombre de su padre, un criminal buscado, donde conoce al joven emperador Garyun. Él promete salvar la vida de su padre a cambio de sus servicios de por vida. Después de ganarse la confianza de Garyun, viaja por el mundo resolviendo problemas sobrenaturales que surgen en lugar del Emperador. ¿Pero cuánto tiempo puede continuar esta vida sin que los demás descubran que en realidad es una mujer?

altTitles.ja: カードファイト!! ヴァンガード will+Dress D2

description.en: Mukae Jinki have gathered 15 Fighters, and One who have chosen from winning all the Shop Tournaments. These 16 fighters will fight for the throne to be the strongest, as the Curtain for the Second Deluxe Opens!! Who will be the one to Control the fight, who will be the one to win!?

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.ja: 開花アパートメント

description.en:
*Everyone who lives there has a “reason” for doing so.* 

Towards the end of the Taisho era (1912 - 1926), Fuji, a translator, moves into the so-called “Kaika Apartment”—a luxurious housing complex overflowing with elegance. Little does he know that all the residents there harbor secrets…but what are they? And, does Fuji have a secret of his own...?

---

Peculiar tales of an apartment complex filled to bursting with bewitching, intertwining, and twisted human relationships.
description.vi:
Một nơi chỉ toàn những “kỳ nhân dị sĩ”.
Vào cuối thời Taisho, Fuji, một dịch giả chuyển đến Chung cư Kaika đầy hoa lệ. Nhưng dường như cư dân ở đây đều che những bí mật nào đó…Và dường như Fuji cũng có một bí mật…?

altTitles.ja: ちーちゃん

description.en:
It was the day Chiichan, who never comes to middle school at all, suddenly showed up in her tattered sweats with dead insects, causing a commotion in the class. Yuua has been with her since kindergarten and cares about her, and her classmate Koudai asks if he can help Chiichan out...
A new series born from a unique collaboration, in which Oshimi Shuuzou depicts the prequel to Chiichan, the aberrant heroine of Naitou Eisuke's film *Poison Girl*, as an original manga *Chiichan*!
description.fr: Chii, qui ne vient habituellement pas en cours, se présente un jour vétue de haillons, et un insecte à la main. De quoi faire parler la classe...
description.es-la: Chii-chan, quien rara vez asiste a la escuela secundaria, que viste un desgastado chándal y tiene un hobby peculiar. Un día hace algo que causa miedo en el salón, por lo que, dos jóvenes tratan de ayudarla. Esta nueva serie es una colaboración en la que Shūzō Oshimi dibuja la precuela del extraordinario personaje de Chii-chan, la inusual personaje de la película "Doku Musume" dirigida por Eirō Naitō.

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランド オーダー－トゥルス・レアルタ－

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ: Звёздное путешествие

description.en:
"The human race will become extinct in 2017." The Chaldea organization, an organization charged with preserving the future of humanity, observes a singularity. To solve it, Rika Fujimaru and Mash Kyrielight will be transported to the city of Fuyuki in 2004. The battle for the future of humanity has begun.

---
**Note**: This manga adapts the first, third, fifth, seventh and final singularity from Part 1 of Fate/Grand Order.
description.ja: 科学と魔術を結集した人理継続保障機関「カルデア」は2017年で人類が消滅することを発見。その原因は、2004年、日本のとある地方都市、冬木市にあった。目が覚めるとカルデアにいた謎の少年、藤丸立香は、自分を「先輩」と呼ぶ少女マシュとともに、人類滅亡を阻止すべく、2004年の冬木市へ跳ぶ。
description.ru: Манга-адаптация основных сюжетных актов игры Fate/Grand Order. Покрывает акты: Фуюки, Орлеан, Океанос, Америка, Вавилония. Повествование ведется от лица Фудзимару Рицуке. 2015 год. В мире все еще господствует магия. Для сохранения своего рода человечество возвело научную лабораторию под названием «Халдея». Суть ее существования заключалась в том, чтобы наблюдать за миром при помощи той самой магии и достижений человечества. Благодаря усилиям ученых было подтверждено, что человечеству оставалось жить еще как минимум 100 лет. Однако «Халдея» зафиксировала некую аномалию, в результате которой наблюдаемая лабораторией область будущего внезапно исчезла. Все эти события привели к панике, и ученые принялись изучать полученные данные. Выяснилось, что в городе Фуюки в 2004 году существовала область, которая ни разу за всю историю существования «Халдеи» не попадала в поле ее зрения. Также подтвердилось вымирание человечества уже в 2017 году. По результатам полученных данных «Халдея» принимает решение задействовать программу «Рейшифт». Смысл - отправить группу специально подготовленных людей (Мастеров) в прошлое для ликвидации аномалии. Однако, в лаборатории происходит взрыв, и все Мастера оказываются в критическом состоянии. Одному из них, Рицуке Фудзимару, все же удается попасть в прошлое, где разворачивалась легендарная война за Святой Грааль. Теперь ему предстоит выяснить, что же на самом деле произошло, и, по возможности, устранить угрозу.

altTitles.ja: ばっどがーる

description.en:
The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?
(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)
Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. 
But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?
A totally not "bad" delinquent girl's 4-koma school life manga!

description.en:
Kurhi, the first prince of the Gahama Kingdom, was the epitome of a "spoiled prince" with his arrogant attitude and behavior. After countless misdeeds, he was finally banished from the royal family and reduced to a commoner.

The mud-covered former prince finds himself at an inn run by Emma, a girl with a severe obsession with royalty. Emma is bewildered by the sudden appearance of her "favorite" and experiences a major dissonance with his changed personality.

Determined to help her "favorite" get back on his feet, Emma embarks on a grand project!
description.ja:
ガハマ王国の第一王子クルヒは、
尊大な態度と言動で絵に描いた“ダメ王子”だった。
数々の悪行の果て、遂に王家から追放され
平民に身を落としてしまう――。

泥だらけの元王子がたどり着いたのは
重度の王宮オタクの少女・エマが営む宿屋で!?

一方エマは、突然目の前に現れた“推し”に困惑。
変わり果てた性格に盛大な解釈違いを起こし――…。

“推し”の人生再起を成し遂げるべく
エマの壮大なプロジェクトが始動！
description.th: องค์ชายครูฮี ผู้หยิ่งทระนงและอหังการ ถูกขับไล่จากพระราชวังเนื่องจากความประพฤติอันเหลวไหลไร้ขอบเขต องค์ชายพลัดถิ่นซัดเซพเนจรมาถึงโรงแรมเล็กๆ ซึ่งมีเอ็มม่า ผู้คลั่งไคล้ทุกสิ่งในวังหลางเป็นเจ้าของ เมื่อครูฮีผู้เคยสูงส่งต้องสูญสิ้นทุกสิ่ง เอ็มม่าผู้บูชาความสมบูรณ์แบบก็มิอาจทนเห็นองค์ชายผู้เป็นที่รักต้องตกต่ำ นางจึงวางแผนการอันยิ่งใหญ่เพื่อฟื้นฟูเกียรติยศแห่งองค์ชายผู้เป็นที่รักให้กลับคืนมา

description.en:
The valuable treasure, the “Encore” which was left by the legendary Elline the Brave Hero, has the recording of the end of the world and the reincarnation of the world. The countries and brigades (parties) all over the world are searching for its whereabouts; the age to fight for the Encore. The boy called Ren who wants to become a knight has no talent in wielding swords despite looking exactly like the Elline the Brave Hero, he has been having a lifestyle where people taunts him as the “Fake Brave Hero”. The one that appears in front of him is the legendary Dragon Princess Krische, who had woken up from her seal. She mistakes Ren for Elline, though she gets disappointed since he simply looks like him, but she later finds out a hidden potential in him. And she invites him to the journey to find the Encore together with the Archangel Phia and the Demon-Lord Elise that saved the world before. “Do you want to come with us?”. This is the prelude of wild excitement played by the heroes. The boy known as the fake Brave Hero cross paths with the legend now!  
  


---
description.fr:
À la fin de la Guerre de la Fin, le Héros vaillant, Elline, laissa derrière lui un trésor inestimable, l’Encore, archive contenant tout de ce monde, de sa création à sa réincarnation. Les pays du monde envoyèrent des équipes d’aventuriers à la recherche de l’Encore, et formèrent la jeunesse pour leur futur. Ren E. Maxwell, un épéiste en devenir sans talent, est moqué par tous ces camarades : copie conforme d’Elline, il est appelé le Faux héros vaillant. Un jour cependant, il fit la rencontre de Kylse, ancienne équipière d’Elline. Celle-ci le confond alors avec Elline… La légende du Faux héros vaillant commence ici!  
  


---

description.pt: O valioso tesouro, o "Encore", que foi deixado pelo lendário Bravo Herói, Elline, tem a gravação do fim do mundo e a reencarnação do mundo. Os países e as brigadas (partes) em todo o mundo estão buscando a localização do seu paradeiro; a era de lutas pelo Encore. O garoto chamado Ren que quer se tornar um cavaleiro, mas não tem talento empunhando espadas, apesar de procurar ser exatamente como o Elline the Brave Hero, ele tem tido um estilo de vida onde as pessoas zombam dele como o "Falso Bravo Herói". O que aparece na frente dele é a lendária Princesa Dragão Krische, que tinha acordado de seu selamento. Ela confunde Ren com Elline, embora ela fica decepcionada, pois ele simplesmente parece com ele, mas ela mais tarde descobre um potencial oculto nele. E ela o convida para a viagem para encontrar o Encore, juntamente com a Arcanja Phia e a Lorde Demônio Elise que salvaram o mundo antes. "Você quer vir conosco?." - Este é o prelúdio de excitação selvagem desempenhado pelos heróis. O garoto conhecido como o falso com seu caminho cruzado com a lenda Bravo Herói começa agora!
description.pt-br: O valioso tesouro, o “Encore”, deixado pelo lendário Bravo Herói, Elline, tem a gravação do fim do mundo e a reencarnação do mundo. Os países e os grupos de aventureiros em todo o mundo, estão buscando sua localização. O garoto chamado Ren que quer se tornar um cavaleiro, mas não tem talento empunhando espadas, apesar de procurar ser exatamente como o Elline o Bravo Herói, ele tem sido menosprezado pelas pessoas que o chamam de “Falso Bravo Herói”. Quem aparece na frente dele é a lendária Princesa dos Dragões, Kyelse, que acordou de seu selamento. Ela confunde Ren com Elline, embora fique decepcionada, pois ele é simplesmente alguém parecido ao seu falecido companheiro, mais tarde um potencial oculto é descoberto nele, então ela o convida para uma viagem em busca do Encore, com a Arcanjo, Fear e a Lorde Demônio, Elise, que salvaram o mundo anteriormente. “Você quer vir conosco?.” – Este é o prelúdio de excitação selvagem desempenhado pelos heróis. O garoto conhecido como uma cópia barata tem seu caminho cruzado com a lenda do Bravo Herói! 68 Visualizações totais, 68 Visualizações hoje

description.en: Others bind the system to quickly travel through levels and fight the BOSS. When it comes to Li Anan, she is the BOSS! The scumbag is in a high position? Li Anan directly crushes him: "Kneel down!" The bitch is deeply scheming? Li Anan taunted at full level: "Just This?" Holding the Lord God System in hand, Li Anan blocks the killing gods all the way, kills the scumbag men and tortures the scumbag girls, and saves the love brain. He is bound to fight back to the world terminal and regain the Godhead of the Creator God! With this one, he will be the only one in the world!

altTitles.ja: バツハレ

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist, Wakou Ichiro, who decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But, when he opens the door of his house.... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived, his life changes again when suddenly, a certain woman appears in front of him? Thus begins a new story, a new erotic comedy!
description.ja: ２度目の結婚記念日。仕事を終えて帰宅した和光市路が目撃したのは見知らぬ男と交わる妻の姿だった──！住み慣れた我が家、幸福な日々、そして愛する人を失った和光だったが、そんな彼の前に現れたのは…！？
description.vi: Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, Wakou Ichiro về nhà sớm để kỷ niệm 2 năm ngày cưới với vợ mình. Nhưng bất ngờ khi mở cửa ra thì... Anh phát hiện vợ mình đang làm tình với người đàn ông khác. Cuộc hôn nhân dù ngắn nhưng cũng làm cuộc sống của anh thay đổi một lần nữa. Bất ngờ một cô gái xuất hiện trước mặt anh, câu truyện vừa hài vừa lứng sẽ bắt đầu?
description.es-la: La historia empieza con el protagonista, Wakou Ichiro, quien decida regresar temprano a casa del trabajo para celebrar su segundo aniversario con su esposa. Pero, cuando abre la puerta de su casa... ¡Se encuentra a su esposa siéndole infiel! A pesar de que matrimonio duró muy poco, su vida vuelve a cambiar cuando de repente, frente a él se aparece cierta mujer... ¡Así comienza una nueva historia, una nueva comedía erótica!

description.en: When the not-so-famous actress Jane wakes up in the morning, her cute-but-nagging son Ian already had her day plan out for her – go on a blind date and find a father for the household. However, her date turns out to be Mark Quinn, the biological father of her son. The sullen business man obviously doesn't have the best impression of Jane and would not have expected that they will enter marriage soon with the help of Mark's father and Ian...

Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.en:
"I want you to make me a love potion."

The “Witch of the Lake” had her heart broken when the object of her one-sided affection requested that she make him a love potion.

If that’s the case, then I wish to spend more time with him, even if it’s just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself, and yet…

The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love.

description.en:
Shizuku Hoshikawa, a high school girl who lives avoiding contact with people, writes a novel which is accidentally read by her classmate Kaori Asaka.  
She loves it but finds out Hoshikawa wasn't planning to write anymore due to lack of ideas, to which she ends up saying:  
"Let's start going out, you and me… You can write a story about our own love."
description.zh-hk: 個性內向的少女星川雫，偷偷地在寫百合小說。原本她打算寫完這篇小說之後，就要結束自己的性命。但就在她把小說的草稿，拿到學校的垃圾場去丟掉時，遇到了同班的朝香夏織。夏織是一位跟她完全不同的少女，而那份小說的草稿，卻被夏織撿走了。原本她以為夏織看完自己寫的小說之後會嘲笑她，沒想到夏織卻說非常的感動，還說想看她寫戀愛小說。小雫原本是以沒有想寫的題材為藉口來推托掉，沒想到夏織卻提議兩個人交往，並且透過這個體驗，來寫下屬於她們的戀愛小說！

His name is Ootsuki, and he is the leader of Squad E and a master of enjoying himself all day long with eating, drinking, and having a great time.

description.en:
A series in *Young Magazine* and *Young Magazine the 3rd* where authors create the 100th chapter of a series… without creating Chapters 1–99 first!

1. *Offside Trap* by Kumeta Kouji ([Young Magazine 2015 No. 6](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym/2015/2015-6.html))
Ashida Isami is the star player of the Kota High Soccer Club, and childhood friends with its manager, Kaneda Chiyo. Just as his teammates go missing, his mysterious rival recovers from an injury…

2. *Look Forward To When You Eat It!* by Ooima Yoshitoki ([Young Magazine the 3rd 2015 No. 2](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym3/2015/2015-2.html)) (Raw: [Comic DAYS Blog](https://comic-days.com/blog/entry/2018/01/11/110000))

3. *Bravery Saga* by Yoshimoto Masume ([Young Magazine the 3rd 2015 No. 3](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym3/2015/2015-3.html)) (Raws: [Comic DAYS Blog](https://comic-days.com/blog/entry/2018/01/15/110000), [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/10834108156652934194))

4. *BattleSexer SEISHIROU* by Kubo Yasuhisa ([Young Magazine the 3rd 2015 No. 4](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym3/2015/2015-4.html)) (Raw: [Comic DAYS Blog](https://comic-days.com/blog/entry/3rd100/seishiro))
It's the 23rd century, an age of science and technology, and sex is no longer required to reproduce. However, humanity has not forgotten sex! Sex has evolved to become a form of martial arts, and those who practice it are known throughout the world as BattleSexers!

5. *New Oni Legend - Any Crying Children Here‽* by Oshikiri Rensuke ([Young Magazine the 3rd 2015 No. 5](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym3/2015/2015-5.html)) (Raw: [Comic DAYS Blog](https://comic-days.com/blog/entry/2018/01/30/110000))

6. *Simple Z ~The Perfect Detective Kanta's First And Last Case~* by Suzuki Nakaba ([Young Magazine the 3rd 2015 No. 6](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym3/2015/2015-6.html)) (Raw: [Comic DAYS Blog](https://comic-days.com/blog/entry/2018/01/18/110000))

7. *Mosaic!!* by Umeda Abi ([Young Magazine the 3rd 2015 No. 6](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym3/2015/2015-6.html)) (Raw: [Comic DAYS Blog](https://comic-days.com/blog/entry/2018/01/22/110000))

8. *Wish For Sasa ★* by Yamamoto Souichirou ([Young Magazine the 3rd 2015 No. 7](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym3/2015/2015-7.html)) - **Included in [Love Letter -Yamamoto Souichirou Short Story Collection-](https://mangadex.org/title/75de5e90-9621-4c0f-899f-056a90ef0061)**

9. *BOWWOW Providence ―An Alternative View Of The Eight Dog Chronicles―* by Segawa Masaki ([Young Magazine the 3rd 2015 No. 8](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym3/2015/2015-8.html)) (Raw: [Comic DAYS Blog](https://comic-days.com/blog/entry/2018/02/01/110000))

10. *The Very Delish Restaurant Kirishima!!* by Seo Kouji ([Young Magazine the 3rd 2015 No. 9](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym3/2015/2015-9.html)) (Raws: [Comic DAYS Blog](https://comic-days.com/blog/entry/2018/01/08/110000), [Twitter](https://x.com/seokouji/status/1176861725779316736))

11. *Sacrificial Shrine Maiden Touya* by Yoshimura Kana ([Young Magazine the 3rd 2015 No. 12](https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/ym3/2015/2015-12.html)) (Raws: [Comic DAYS Blog](https://comic-days.com/blog/entry/2018/01/25/110000), [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/10834108156637582736))

Lin Feng travelled through worlds and even obtained an overpowered system, but he still faces a pressure as huge as a mountain.

System’s main quest:
Lin Feng is to create a school; establish history’s number 1 sect and Lin Feng himself to become the number 1 founder.

To become history’s number 1 founder, Lin Feng started to work hard.

“Your name is Shi Tianhao? Natural born sovereign roots but it was stolen by your cousin? Now being raised in a little village your father placed you in? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let those people know that justice that is owed must be returned!”

“Your name is Xiao Yan? A genius of the past but a loser now? Even your fiancé came over to humiliate you by asking for a divorce? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let that brat know the meaning of: don’t bully a youngster just because he’s poor!”

“Your name is Zhu Yi? The son of a marquis but you’re being suppressed by your father? Your mother was a saint but she was assassinated? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let your dad know the meaning how problems can be solved with your fists…no, with reasoning!”
description.zh: 简介穿越了，也有了一个系统，但林锋压力山大。系统主线任务：林锋开山立派，建立史上第一大宗门，林锋本人成为第一祖师。于是为了成为史上第一祖师爷，林锋开始奋斗。少年，跟为师一起开山立派吧！
description.pt-br: Lin Feng um viajante conseguiu um sistema que pode facilitar sua vida, mas ainda é muito difícil. Primeira missão do sistema, criar uma seita e conseguir discípulos e esta seita deve ser a melhor do mundo. Para ser o melho Lin Feng vai ter que trabalhar duro e ao mesmo tempo treinar seus novos discípulos.

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

title.en: Inkya Datta Ore no Seishun Revenge: Tenshi sugiru Ano Ko to Ayumu Re Life

altTitles.ja: 陰キャだった俺の青春リベンジ 天使すぎるあの娘と歩むReライフ

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya Datta Ore no Seishun Revenge: Tenshi sugiru Ano Ko to Ayumu Re Life

altTitles.ru: Месть моей юности: Моя жизнь с девушкой, которая была слишком похожа на ангела

altTitles.en: The Revenge of My Youth: My Re Life with a Girl Who Was Too Much of an Angel

altTitles.ja: 陰リベ

description.en:
This is the story of Niihama Shincirou, who collapsed after being ravaged by a black company and woke up to find that he had been sent back to his second year of high school. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a time leap to his second year of high school. His high school life …… was gray and shady, but he’s sure he can start over now.

The beautiful girl of his dreams, Haruka Shijouin, whom he met again over time, is even more innocent and cute than he remembered, and above all, she has been staring straight at Niihama.

*“I feel like you’ve changed a lot from the Niihama I knew yesterday. You’re still kind, but you’ve grown up, and that’s wonderful!”*

If I could change the future, I would definitely save her life after she took her own life after being severely bullied. With the adult mentality and corporate power that I’ve acquired, I’m going to take my revenge on my second youth with her–!
description.id: bercerita tentang seorang budak korporat bernama Niihama Shincirou yang bekerja di perusahaan gelap dia pingsan setelah kelelahan bekerja dan ketika terbangun ia terkejut karena ternyata dia mengalami lompatan waktu dan kembali ke masa di mana dia masih seorang murid SMA. lalu karena dia sudah kembali ke masa lalu dia bertekad untuk balas dendam dengan menjadi lebih aktif dan berjuang untuk mendapatkan hal yang dia inginkan tidak peduli siapapun lawannya sampai pada akhirnya menebus semua penyesalan yang telah ia lakukan di kehidupan sebelumnya...
description.ja:
ブラック企業勤めの社畜サラリーマン・新浜心一郎は、過労の末に職場で倒れ――――目が覚めると高校時代に！？
タイムリープ青春"リベンジ"ラブコメ、ここに開幕！
description.pt-br:
Niihama Shinichirou, o qual desmaiou após ser explorado ao extremo por uma ‘companhia exploradora’ e ao acordar descobriu que havia sido mandado de volta para o segundo ano do ensino médio. Sua vida escolar foi sombria e melancólica… No entanto, ele tem certeza de que agora pode recomeçar.
Haruka Shijouin, uma linda garota que ele conheceu antes, de repente parece ainda mais inocente e bonita do que Shinichirou se lembrava, e acima de tudo, ela olha diretamente para ele… 

“Eu sinto que você está bem diferente do Niihama que eu conhecia ontem. Você continua gentil, mas você cresceu, e isso é maravilhoso!” 

Se eu pudesse mudar o futuro, eu definitivamente iria salvá-la depois que ela tirou a própria vida após sofrer severamente por conta de bullying. Com a mentalidade adulta e poderes corporativos que adquiri, eu vou me vingar da minha segunda juventude com ela–!

Очаровательный цветок расцветает с достоинством

altTitles.ja: #薫る花

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

altTitles.ja: 彼岸島 最後の47日間

altTitles.th: เกาะกระหายเลือด - 47วันสุดท้ายสู่หายนะ

description.en:
This is a continuation of the story of Higanjima : featuring an isolated island, inhabited by warring vampires and humans, and surrounded by aquatic demons that foil any attempts at entry or escape that are not explicitly authorised by their vampiric overlord , Miyabi.   
  
Ryousuke, his girlfriend Kazumi, and his friend Yamaoka are shipwrecked by the demons, and wash up on the shore of Higanjima. They soon experience the monstrous cruelty of the island's vampires first-hand but, luckily, Ryousuke is able to join up with the human resistance.   
  
His only desire is to leave Higanjima…however, mainland Japan may not be safe for long either. If the vampiric threat is not eradicated in 47 days, then Miyabi's machinations will transform it into yet another vampire island!
description.fr:
Akira et la résistance humaine sont parvenus à conquérir le temple fortifié où résidait Miyabi. Alors que les derniers survivants profitent d'un repos de quelques jours bien mérité, un groupe d'étudiants échoue sur l'île d'Higanjima après avoir été attaqué par les démons marins. Ryosuke, Kasumi et Yamaoka vont très rapidement découvrir la cruauté sans limite des vampires.  
  
Miyabi, de son côté, ne compte pas en rester là et se prépare à attaquer le Japon directement grâce au nouveau moyen qu'il a trouvé pour vamprisier un maximum d'humain en un temps record. Son plan nécessite cependant 47 jours avant de pouvoir être mis en oeuvre.

description.en: After—something—changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town—reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.

altTitles.ru: На самом деле, я самый сильный?

altTitles.ja: 実は俺、最強でした？

altTitles.fr: Suis-je en fait le plus fort ?

description.en:
To be reincarnated into another world with the promise of a "cheat" power is one thing... but to be reborn as a baby, and then left for dead after your royal parents think you're powerless? That's another thing entirely!

Now the newly-born Reinhart — or Hart to his new friends — must find his way through a dangerous world. But luckily, he's got magic that's quite literally off the charts!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10050/episode/322262) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/am-i-actually-the-strongest/)
description.pt:
Um NEET é renascido em outro mundo com a promessa de um avida pacifica. Apesar de ter nascido na realeza, devido a sua magica parecer fraca, seus pais o abandonaram sem pensar em uma floresta para ser devorado por monstros. Contudo sua magia é desumanamente poderosa. O que ele devera fazer para obter a vida pacifica que ele tanto deseja?

Hikikomori (引き篭り) é um termo que significa literalmente isolado em casa, ele é usado para referir-se a pessoas que apresentam graves níveis de isolamento, normalmente são jovens entre 13 e 39 anos que muitas vezes são sustentados pelos pais ou trabalham online. NEET é basicamente a mesma coisa mas tem suas diferenças."
description.ru: Парень перерождается в другой мир, чтобы иметь обещанную мирную жизнь. Ребенком его бросают в лесу за низкий уровень магии, который не может быть измерен современными радарами. Что ему нужно сделать, чтобы достичь мирной жизни, которую он так желает?
description.es-la: Un chico renace en otro mundo para tener una vida pacífica. Un bebé nacido de poder y realeza, abandonado en el bosque por tener un poder que no puede ser comparado ni por los radares modernos (no, no esta ni cerca de sobrepasar los 9000). ¿Qué hara para obtener la vida pacífica que él tanto desea?"

description.en: Hands. It is one of the most complex organs in the human body, with a particularly complex function and structure. Therefore, there is a doctor who specializes in this organ: <Hand Surgeon>. Isshin Tezuka is a hand surgeon at Ohrando Hospital. He has an aloof appearance and is full of mystery, but the only thing that is certain about him is that he is an extremely talented hand surgeon. This is a life story woven by his hands and the many hands he heals. An authentic medical drama for the new era!
description.ja:
その日、病院に運び込まれた男性は、事故で右腕が切断されていた。絶望する男性の息子に救急スタッフが告げる。「再接着手術を行います――」「くっつくんですか…父の右腕が!?」不可能を可能にするのは【手専門の医者】。

【手外科医】手塚一心。

Old Man, the Low-tier Healer, and the Beloved Daughter's Frontier Life ~A Middle-aged Man Awakens to Healing Skills and Rises to Become a Hero~

description.en: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level 『Healing Magic』! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
description.ja: Fランクの治癒士、レダ・ディクソン(30)は、年齢を理由にパーティーから追放されてしまう。傷心のレダは心機一転、田舎町・アムルスへの移住を決意。その道中で、みすぼらしい恰好をしたブロンドヘアの少女・ミナと出会う。アムルスで、少女とともに新生活を始めたレダは、無自覚チートだった『回復魔法』のおかげで町民から“先生”と呼ばれる存在までに!二人は様々なトラブルを解決するとともに、家族の絆を深めていく―。
description.ru: Рэда Диксон, 30 летний лекарь F ранга, который был отстранен от службы из-за возраста. От безысходности он решает переехать в Загородную деревушку Амурт для того, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа. По стечениям обстоятельств он встречает Мину, маленькую девочку со светлыми волосами, одетую в одни лохмотья. Родителей у нее нет, поэтому добродушный Рэда становится ей опекуном. Благодаря магии исцеления Рэды, все в поселке называют его "Сенсеем". Рэда и его семья вместе решают проблемы и укрепляют семейные связи.

description.en:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven???

Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity? A romantic comedy between two innocent souls.
description.ja: 人暮らしの男子高校生、徳光森太郎。彼が自宅のベランダで出会ったのは清楚で優しい女の子『とわ』。けれど彼女の正体は…？　無垢な二人の胸キュン同居ラブコメディ♪
description.vi: Chúng ta đã quen với câu chuyện về anh nhân viên nhặt được bé JK tại lề đường. Nhưng sẽ ra sao nếu vẫn với chủ đề nhặt được người ấy, cậu học sinh năm nhất cao trung lại nhặt được một thiên thần từ Thiên Đàng ngay trong căn hộ của cậu ta? Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo??
description.pt-br:
O que  aconteceria se você acordasse e visse uma linda garota deitada ao seu lado na cama? Além disso, ela não é uma garota comum, mas sim um Anjo que vem do Céu???

Shintarou Tokamitsu é um estudante do ensino médio que mora sozinho. Um dia, ele encontrou uma linda garota sentada em sua varanda. O nome dela é Towa, mas qual é a sua verdadeira identidade? Uma comédia romântica entre duas almas inocentes.

El utilero Saitou en otro mundo

description.en: Handyman Saitou has never been anyone special. All his life, he’s had average grades, ordinary athletic skill, a commonplace job… But his unremarkable path takes a turn when he wakes up in another world. Here, warriors, wizards, and elves accompany him on quests delving deep into dungeons, and Saitou realizes for the first time what it’s like to be needed. After all, who other than the handyman could be trusted to open locked treasure chests or repair his allies’ equipment? Beginning with a simple “thank you,” this is the story of an ordinary person’s fulfilling life.
description.es: Saitou es un utilero ordinario que se transporta a otro mundo donde sus habilidades son muy útiles. Empieza a entender realmente lo que significa ser necesario, ya que incluso sus tareas y herramientas mundanas tienen los usos más inesperados en este nuevo mundo de fantasía!
description.ru:
Сайто — мастер на все руки, который попадает в другой мир, где его навыки невероятно полезны. Погружаясь в новую среду, он начинает понимать истинное значение незаменимости.
Мастер на все руки Сайто никогда не был особенным. Всю жизнь у него были средние оценки, обычные спортивные навыки, заурядная работа... Но его ничем не примечательная жизнь меняется, когда он просыпается в другом мире. Здесь воины, волшебники и эльфы сопровождают его в заданиях, углубляясь в подземелья, и Сайто впервые осознает, что значит быть нужным. Ведь кому, как не мастеру на все руки, можно доверить открытие запертых сундуков с сокровищами или ремонт снаряжения союзников? История обычного человека, начавшаяся с простого «спасибо», — это история его полноценной жизни.
description.pt-br: Saitou é um faz-tudo comum que é transportado para outro mundo onde suas habilidades são muito úteis. Ele começa realmente a entender o que significa ser necessário.

Я пытался доказать, что наука влюбилась

altTitles.zh: 理科生坠入情网，故尝试证明。
试证明理科生已坠入情网。

altTitles.zh-hk: 理科生墜入情網，故嘗試證明。
試證明理科生已墜入情網。

description.en: Yukimura Shinya and Himuro Ayame are two scientists that want to find out if love can be solved by a scientific theory. These two scientists also have feelings for each other and want to be able to solve their true feelings through similar theoretical facts. With this perfect opportunity, these scientists will attempt to solve the theory of the love they express for each other.
description.ru: Химуро Аямэ и Юкимура Шинья ну просто обожают точные науки. Им надо, чтобы всё имело научное обоснование, ведь без этого нельзя быть уверенным ни в чём. Ох уж эти ученые, какие только эксперименты не придут в эти головы, чтобы доказать "любовь".

altTitles.zh-hk: 身為魔王的我娶了奴隸精靈為妻、該如何表白我的愛？

altTitles.ja: 魔王の俺が奴隷エルフを嫁にしたんだが、どう愛でればいい？

altTitles.ko: 마왕인 내가 노예 엘프를 신부로 삼았는데 어떻게 사랑하면 되지?

altTitles.pt-br: O Dilema de um Arquidemônio: Como Amar sua Noiva Elfa

altTitles.es: Soy un Rey Demonio y he Tomado Como Esposa a una Elfa Esclava, ¿Cómo Puedo Amarla?

altTitles.es-la: Soy un Rey Demonio y he Tomado Como Esposa a una Elfa Esclava, ¿Cómo Puedo Amarla?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.es: Zagan es temido como un mago malvado, es torpe y tiene una lengua afilada, y una vez más tuvo que acabar con unos ladrones que invadieron su territorio cuando estaba investigando esa mañana. En una oscura subasta, encuentra a una esclava elfa blanca, Nephie, que posee una belleza sin igual. Enamorado de ella a primera vista, utiliza su fortuna para comprarla, pero tan pobre como es socialmente, no entiende cómo relacionarse con ella. Así comienza la torpe convivencia del mago que no sabe transmitir su amor y la esclava que suspira por su amo pero no sabe cómo planteárselo.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

altTitles.ja: 廻天のアルバス

description.en:
The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But… it was too late.

Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. 

Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn’t matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster. 

Hero Albus seeks to reclaim the future he desires from the past in this ultra-fast readventure (real-time attack) fantasy!
description.vi:
Ma vương đã bị đánh bại... Thế giới sẽ hòa bình trở lại. Nhưng... Đã quá muộn rồi... Anh hùng Albus thật sự đang rất vội. Câu chuyện tua ngược, như thể một cách tự nhiên, trở lại nơi mọi chuyện khởi đầu.

Người anh hùng đầy hiểu biết Albus với đôi mắt lờ đờ như thiếu ngủ, dấn thân vào một cuộc phiêu lưu mới, nơi “thời gian là thứ quan trọng nhất”.

Được đăng dài kỳ trên Weekly Shounen Sunday, nơi đã đăng tải siêu phẩm “Thám tử lừng danh Conan”, người Anh hùng Albus tìm cách giành lại tương lai mà anh ấy mong muốn từ quá khứ trong thế giới fantasy “speedrun” một cách đúng nghĩa này!
description.es-la: El Rey Demonio es derrotado... El mundo está en paz. Pero fue demasiado tarde... El héroe Albus tiene prisa. La historia da vueltas y comienza de nuevo desde el principio, como si fuera algo natural. ¡Esta es una fantasía de re-aventura de alta velocidad donde "el tiempo es lo más importante" para el experto héroe Albus.

description.en:
Beings from a different dimension have started a war with mankind. To counter this threat, an academy called "Genetics" that trains female warriors called "Pandora," who can wield special weaponry and armor, was formed. Kazuya Aoi decided to enroll in this school because of a promise with his sister, an outstanding alumnus who died in battle. There he meets second year Satellizer L. Bridgette, nicknamed "The Untouchable Queen" due to her solitary demeanor but also top of her class whose battle simulation streak is undefeated, until he came… and slowly changed her.  
  
Colourized / Webtoon version

JaeSin was turned into an insignificant small creature and ousted to the human world for violating the law of causality and the only way he can go back to the underworld is to win a human’s love. He doesn’t believe in human emotions until he bumped into a crown prince, Nok, who’s been suffering from heartbreak for a long time. He then started getting curious about him…

“There you are. A fool with unrequited love.”
description.pl: Jako syn króla Yeomra z podziemnego świata, Jaeshin prowadził hedonistyczne życie pełne ciągle zmieniających się partnerów łóżkowych i protekcjonalności wobec ludzi. Pewnego dnia jednak przekracza granicę i zostaje ukarany w dość nietypowy sposób: w dzień staje się bezsilnym szczeniakiem, a w nocy człowiekiem. Jedynym sposobem na uniknięcie kary jest zdobycie ludzkiego serca, co nie będzie łatwe... zwłaszcza, gdy człowiekiem, na którego zwrócił uwagę, jest słodki książę Lee Nok. Czy Jaeshin zdobędzie księcia? A może to Jaeshin zostanie zdobyty?
description.uk: Ча Шин, котрий був вигнаним з власного світу за вчинення злочину, котрий порушив порядок життя та смерті. Його єдиний спосіб повернутись назад в підземний світ - завоювати людське серце. Перед Ча Шином, який не вірить у людську великодушність, постає спадкоємний принц Нок, у котрого розбите серце через невзаємне кохання. Демон починає цікавитись Ноком... Цікавий початок... Що ж буде далі?
description.es-la: Jae-shin, quien se convirtió en un criminal y fue expulsado de este mundo. Su única forma de regresar al inframundo es obteniendo un corazón humano. Frente a Jae-shin, que no cree en las emociones humanas, aparece el príncipe heredero Nok, que tiene un problema del corazón desde hace mucho tiempo, Jae-shin comienza a sentir curiosidad por la situación de Nok. "Hay un idiota que alberga un amor que no se puede cumplir.”

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story - The Blue Destiny

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム外伝 THE BLUE DESTINY

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden: The Blue Destiny

description.en: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story: The Blue Destiny is a one volume manga based on the Sega Saturn game developed by Bandai, written and illustrated by Takayama Mizuho, published by Kodansha and serialized by Comic Bom Bom in 1997. The story revolves around Yuu Kajima, who is a soldier with the Earth Federation Forces during the One Year War, testing new technology before it's mass-produced. During a routine battle, he and his teammates come under attack from a mysterious blue Mobile Suit that attacks like a monster, barely escaping with their lives. Returning to base, Yuu is assigned to pilot that same machine - Blue Destiny. As he uses his new machine and clashes with Zeon ace Nimbus Schterzen, Yuu learns that there may be more to the enigmatic Blue Destiny and its EXAM System than he previously thought.
